title: The ICC
summary: Website Migration and Framework Innovation: Orchestrated the migration of the ICC site to Preact, boosting performance and maintainability. Engineered a white-label site framework for tournaments, reducing reskinning time from 1 month to 1 day.
Youth Engagement Microsite: Designed and developed Criiio, an interactive microsite that increased youth cricket engagement by 50%, delivering personalised experiences for young athletes.

Campaign Collaboration and Documentation: Partnered with marketing teams to create UX/UI strategies for promotional campaigns, increasing peak-season traffic by 15%. Established documentation standards that improved onboarding efficiency by 40%.
